channel.title: Pages on Paofu Puffles
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Paofu Puffles

item.title: About Puffles the Cat
item.description:
1. Yes, I do know my name. If you call me, I’ll respond, unless I’m busy with my own things.
  2. I’m very good at hunting. Yes, including your hand, if you put it where my paws can reach. Yes, even when I’m just lying down, chilling. I’m that good at hunting. My support thinks that I should learn about “something something hands not toys,” but that’s their problem, not mine. I’m a pretty chill cat in the end, anyways.
